column4: Hi. I'm trying to install Pine, but I keep getting this error message:
Package pine is not available, but is referred to by another package.
This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or
is only available from another source
Well obviously Pine isnt available.  You could use Mutt instead.
ok. does it function like pine?
each game is a seperate executable
aptitude is just another program to use the apt system
